Calculate displaced moment of inertia.

Calculates moment of inertia for given rotation point using Steiner's theorem.

void gpx::phy2d::DispRigidBody::findExtAngularARotationPoints ( RotationPoint &  rpA,
RotationPoint &  rpB 
) [protected]

Find rotation point candidates providing extremal angular acceleration.

Candidate point may denote either maximum or minimum. To find out which is which, recount physics for each of them and compare results.

Parameters:
rpA first rotation point candidate.
rpB second rotation point candidate.
